Name: French Daisy
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Crème de cassis, brandy, lemon juice, and sparkling wine are often mixed together. Here, they are bought together in an effervescent, citrussy floral berry Daisy.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Wayne Collins in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of French Daisy contains 147 calories
